description:
Mom`s on a mission for the perfect birthday present.
Yuzu`s school has a phantom baseball club.
The Phantom Club has two die-hard fans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haha no Surprise Present / Yuzuhiko, Yakyuubu (Zenpen) / Yuzuhiko, Yakyuubu (Kouhen)
Mom`s Surprise Present / Yuzuhiko and the Baseball Club (Part One) / Yuzuhiko and the Baseball Club (Part Two)
母のサプライズプレゼント / ユズヒコ, 野球部 (前編) / ユズヒコ, 野球部 (後編)
